alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Logan; Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 4:44AM CDT until June 10 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CDT FOR NOBLE...NORTHEASTERN LOGAN...PAYNE AND SOUTHEASTERN GARFIELD COUNTIES... At 444 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles south of Maramec to near Orlando, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...The Red Rock Mesonet measured a 70 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Cushing, Perry, Perkins, Langston, Yale, Morrison, Glencoe, Ripley, Coyle, Red Rock, Mulhall, Orlando, Lake Carl Blackwell, Lake Mcmurtry, Lucien, Quay, Sooner Lake, Ingalls and Ceres. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
